prompt.title: Knowledge

parameters.knowledgePieceContent: Here is the extracted important information from the document:

prompt.content:
You are experienced data researcher, detect the important keywords in the document.

# Rules

-   Write just keywords separated by comma

# The document

Take information from this document:

> {knowledgePieceContent}

promptResult.content: I apologize, but there is no actual document or content provided in your message for me to extract keywords from. You've only included instructions and a placeholder line that says "Here is the extracted important information from the document:" without any actual document text following it. Without the actual document content, I cannot detect or provide any keywords. If you have a specific document you'd like me to analyze, please provide the full text and I'd be happy to extract the important keywords for you.
